notes: This map illustrates potential satellite-detected damaged structures in Imias and the surrounding area in Guantanamo Province, Cuba. The UNITAR-UNOSAT analysis used a Pleiades satellite image, acquired on the 10 October 2016, and identified 552 damaged structures within the map extent and 603 damaged structures in the covered area. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR-UNOSAT.
